channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I have early Alzheimer’s and my husband has stage 4 kidney disease. We just inherited $50K. How can this help us?
item.description: “We have a 401(k) with $20,000, and $29,000 in a Roth IRA.”

item.title: Trump says Coke with cane sugar is on its way. But Americans seem fine with the current version.
item.description: Some studies reveal a preference for Coke produced just as it is — with high-fructose corn syrup.

item.title: ‘American Horror Story’ actress Sarah Paulson lists $3 million Hollywood home, after selling Malibu trailer for $1.45 million
item.description: Paulson is preparing to part ways with her longtime Los Angeles abode, putting the midcentury modern Hollywood Hills home on the market for $3 million...

item.title: Can my husband contest his late brother’s $600K will? He experienced oxygen deprivation due to COPD before he died.
item.description: “Around 30 days before passing, he changed everything to go to a friend.”

item.title: One big Wall Street firm is calling for the end of dollar selling, at least for now
item.description: Citi anticipates sideways trading in the dollar, but remains bearish further out.

item.title: A brief history of “three-parent babies”
item.description: This week we heard that eight babies have been born in the UK following an experimental form of IVF that involves DNA from three people. The approach ...

item.title: OpenAI unveils ‘ChatGPT agent’ that gives ChatGPT its own computer to autonomously use your email and web apps, download and create files for you
item.description: If a website needs you to log in, you can do that securely through a special browser view, which lets the agent dig deeper and handle more.

item.title: Mistral’s Le Chat adds deep research agent and voice mode to challenge OpenAI’s enterprise dominance
item.description: Mistral added deep research capabilities to its Le Chat platform, bringing it in direct competition against ChatGPT and Gemini.

item.title: Cohesive Robotics releases Smart Welding Robotic Workcell
